content.raw:
I'll leave labscript importing * for the moment, it imports lots of time consuming things anyway like pylab, so removing the unit conversions import would only be a modest speed improvement. Maybe will break this in labscript 3.

I'll merge this, which paves the way for labscript to save fully qualified unit conversion path names, and BLACS to change to use `get_unit_conversion_class`.

To avoid every subprocess of BLACS importing every unit conversion class (adds a lot to startup time), we'll just continue separating out BLACS tabs from labscript classes in labscript_devices, so that BLACS tabs and workers can be imported without importing labscript.
content.html:
I'll leave labscript importing * for the moment, it imports lots of time consuming things anyway like pylab, so removing the unit conversions import would only be a modest speed improvement. Maybe will break this in labscript 3.

I'll merge this, which paves the way for labscript to save fully qualified unit conversion path names, and BLACS to change to use get_unit_conversion_class.

To avoid every subprocess of BLACS importing every unit conversion class (adds a lot to startup time), we'll just continue separating out BLACS tabs from labscript classes in labscript_devices, so that BLACS tabs and workers can be imported without importing labscript.
